speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Mr Mann on behalf of the Committee on Employment and Social Affairs on the creation of a European Qualifications Framework ( 2006/2002(INI) ) ( A6-0248/2006 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Mr Mann on behalf of the Committee on Employment and Social Affairs on the creation of a European Qualifications Framework ( 2006/2002(INI) ) ( A6-0248/2006 ).
